# BSTA 512/612: Linear Models

### Winter 2025

 

Welcome to BSTA 512/612! In this course, we will focus on linear models, and build our understanding of regression analysis. We will build some theoretical understanding in order to interpret and apply regression models appropriately. We will learn how to build a regression model, interpret the model, and diagnose potential issues with our model.
